reviews.comment: The Whispering Vine is my favorite places to wine shop! The prices are the best in town and the selection is incredible. The knowledge of the staff and their willingness to guide shoppers through their abundant selection makes this a one-of-kind, date night experience. If you haven't been to the Whispering Vine Wine Co., you have been missing out.

reviews.name: accounts/104447125096839272944/locations/13762251274808944694/reviews/AbFvOqmDFlvs4UpsDZz5I3QG-HR6-PfGLeTKKgSiDfwOAz2XdRwf-hkrJRLO6MzNQdIQHMyKTJc8

reviews.comment: Wonderful food, wine, and service

reviews.name: accounts/104447125096839272944/locations/13762251274808944694/reviews/AbFvOqks-qg0XNTThq9rQr-FajfPCHv03w1TiDolz5brNEMHUZjR2-mxyvldGLpR3T4WDJY4Pu_gnw

reviews.comment:
We are always happy when we go to Whispering Vine, and we‚Äôre never disappointed. The food, the drinks (obviously), and the staff are consistently excellent.

They have a great selection of unique, flavorful dishes, and the salt and vinegar tater tots are an absolute staple for us every visit. The charcuterie board is our go-to appetizer‚Äîit‚Äôs loaded with delicious options and always hits the mark.

The staff is incredibly friendly and welcoming, and we really enjoy being able to wander around and choose a bottle (or bottles) of wine to enjoy with dinner. It adds to the overall experience and makes it feel relaxed and personal.

Pricing is very fair for the quality of food, the portion sizes, and the level of service. The wine and alcohol pricing is also very competitive with local shops, and unlike many restaurants, you don‚Äôt pay an inflated premium on wine here.

Overall, I highly recommend Whispering Vine. It‚Äôs a consistently great experience and one of our favorite spots in town.

reviewReply.comment: Thank you, Patrick, for the glowing 5-star review! We're thrilled to hear that every visit to Whispering Vine is a delight for you. We take pride in our excellent staff, fair pricing, and our laid-back, personal atmosphere. We can't wait to have you back for your next wine selection and dining experience!

reviews.name: accounts/104447125096839272944/locations/13762251274808944694/reviews/AbFvOqlI4LfauV6590eNVYkyqd0xTSqA4juMgEPSktfRiTWUzWZueZ219lNA3EPY_yz1SJGtjGgdhw

reviews.comment:
A nice wine bar , they have some nice bottles for sale as well, glass size is generous glasses are not very big however. Some staff are new others more seasoned . Nice private areas in the cellar . The flights do not change often and contain wines that they want to sell some are not always what I would choose . Wines by the glass as well as by the bottle prices are reasonable. Food menu looked good but we did not try. Close to my location and making it a regular hang out .

Since my last review I have frequently dropped in. Hot food is not served till 4pm, however nice dishes are being served. Wine prices are very reasonable considering Reno prices have sored sky high in the past few years.  The atmosphere is charming an older building formerly known as the glory hole a steak house, with a hint of contemporary flare. Patio is nice in spring through autumn and gets pretty noisy in the evenings as many come from all over. Sunday they are closed sad but true. Try them any other day you will be happy you did if you are looking for a cool wine shop with very friendly and knowledgeable staff.

reviewReply.comment: Arniceous, Thank you for taking the time to check us out and give us a review. We think our 8oz pours are generous, but you can always just grab a bottle, with no corkage fee. Our 9oz flights are rotated weekly at our 4th Street location. We hope you return to try our food menu, the burger and truffle tots are a favorite. Cheers!

reviews.name: accounts/104447125096839272944/locations/13762251274808944694/reviews/AbFvOqk4EkFkRtysOhu9f7yFl9reWQSOrF_z8VqPBeTYWK_39mq_CjYF__ea7ACYN__OkpYlSfmj

reviews.comment: Lovely place to go peruse wines and spirits, and enjoy some fantastic food.  Excellent selection of wines that are reasonably priced. If you‚Äôre more of a spirit person, they have some interesting bottles to consider. With a full bar, they can accommodate anyone with wine, beer, or cocktails. The portions are on the small side, but the food is oh so delicious. Reservations are highly recommended. It tends to be very loud so request the tall tables by the window for a slightly quieter experience.  During the summer the patio is nice.

reviewReply.comment: Dani, how can we improve our rating with you? We strive to be the best and love knowing how we can improve! f

reviews.comment: Jordan is the best! She recommends really good wines within a reasonable price range. She‚Äôs friendly, prompt, and took care of our dogs. I highly recommend this place, especially Jordan!!

We can't wait to welcome you back for more amazing moments at Whispering Vine!

reviews.comment: This is my fav place ever ! The patio is perfect and the location is awesome. I‚Äôm sad they close so early and the bartenders are pretty strict on it. But the owners son is super nice and friendly. Glad to know it‚Äôs in such good hands.

reviewReply.comment: Thank you, Graysen, for your wonderful review! We're thrilled to hear that Whispering Vine is your favorite spot and that you enjoy our perfect patio and awesome location. We appreciate your feedback regarding our closing time, and we'll take it into consideration. We're delighted to hear you had a positive interaction with the owner's son. Looking forward to welcoming you back soon!

reviews.comment: One of my favorite South Reno watering holes! Great place to grab a glass of wine after work or a weekend cocktail outside. The staff is friendly and knowledgeable. You can also buy wine and champagne by the bottle to go, and their prices are hard to beat!

reviews.comment:
They were very friendly and helpful. A great place to relax, try some wines and pick something out for a special occasion or just to find something nice for at home üòâ

They also have a variety of beers and harder stuff if you're looking for more than wine to enjoy on site or buy.

They have a few snacks on site but also allow food to be brought in to enjoy while you either taste test a sampler or enjoy your full glass of choice.

Also a perfect start to a date nightüòâ

reviews.comment:
I love the selection here. I also love how knowledgeable the staff is. I don't think it's possible to stump them! If you drink at Whispering Vine and don't finish a bottle they'll cork it for to enjoy at home! (I love Nevada) the only thing disappointing here is they're Meat and Cheese plates.  (They have a couple other "Appetizers" I'm gluten free I haven't had them. I digress)
Dry cheese, dry meat, sloppily thrown in a plate. It's quite expensive for what I is. I think it would be easy to make something a bit more presentable, and enjoyable.

reviewReply.comment: Haily, Thank you for taking the time to review us! We are limited on what we can offer at our South store as we do not have a kitchen there.
